shortDescription: Amadeus provides technology solutions for the global travel industry, catering to airlines, airports, hotels, and travel agencies. The platform enables smarter, smoother, and more efficient travel operations, from booking and managing flights to handling customer experiences and data insights. An example use case is an airline using Amadeus to streamline their passenger service operations and improve customer satisfaction.

cons: Potential high cost for full features
